LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.questDescriptionRule:
questDescription->[intro]The [asker_faction_leaderTitle] of [asker_faction_name] will perform a customary visit with any Count of his domain upon request. Invite him, satisfy his royal needs for [shuttleDelayTicks_duration], and all of you can ride the shuttle to the Imperial flotilla. You may then join the Imperial court, or escape to a new life among the stars. 
Earning the title of Count means completing quests to earn [asker_faction_royalFavorLabel] with [asker_faction_name]. It may take years to finally achieve the title of Count. 
During his visit, you must keep his mood above [lodgersMoodThreshold_percent]. This means providing royal perquisites like a lavish bedroom.[threatsInfo] 
The [asker_faction_leaderTitle] will bring four of his personal guards and place them under your command. You must house these guards, but the [asker_faction_leaderTitle] will not complain if they are killed or unhappy. 
You must keep the visitors at [map_definite] and not send them anywhere else. If you fail this quest or migrate, you will have another chance at it later.
intro(sameQuestsCount==0)->You have learned of a way to escape this planet!\n\n
intro(sameQuestsCount>=1)->You have been given another chance at royal ascent.\n\n
threatsInfo(allowViolentQuests==true,priority=1)->\n\nOthers will take the opportunity to try to kill the [asker_faction_leaderTitle], and will attack with great intensity. Be prepared to defend.
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.3.name: lodgersCount
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.6.label: Quest failed: [resolvedQuestName]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.10.name: lodgers
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.22.name: shuttleDelayTicks
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.23.node.n: The shuttle has arrived to collect the [asker_faction_leaderTitle].\n\nAll of you can accompany the [asker_faction_leaderTitle] on the shuttle and travel to the Imperial flotilla to begin a new life.
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.24.name: enemyFaction
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.26.name: lodgersMoodThreshold
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.27.node.n: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect and keep happy, has been below the minimum mood of [lodgersMoodThreshold] too long. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.28.node.n: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has died. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.29.node.n: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has been arrested. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.30.node.n: Unauthorized, violating surgery has been performed on {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.31.node.n: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has left the assigned settlement. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.32.node.n: The shuttle sent to collect the [asker_faction_leaderTitle] has been destroyed. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.33.node.n: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has run wild. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.35.node.n: The shuttle sent to collect the [asker_faction_leaderTitle] has departed without [asker_objective]. [asker_pronoun] will now leave on foot. [failLetterEndingCommon]
